text:
Amber is an ambulance
she races to emergencies

to get the people to hospital
and make them well again

Amber has a siren
to warn us when she’s driving fast

to save the people every time
and make them well again

when the controller calls
on the radio

Amber is ready
to go go go

If somebody falls
Amber’s waiting to help
with her sirens and her flashing lights

Amber is an ambulance
she’s always calm and takes control

she picks up poorly people
she’ll make them well again

Amber helps in every way
the mechanicals like to say

she’s our best friend every day
when she makes people well again
when the controller calls
on
the radio

Amber is ready
to go go go

If somebody falls
Amber’s waiting to help
with her sirens and her flashing lights

Amber is an ambulance
she’s always calm and takes control

she picks up poorly people
she’ll make them well again

Amber helps in every way
the mechanicals

like to say
she’s our best friend every day
when she makes people well again

we make them 
well again
we make
them well again
